system.name: Overwatch
system.effect: Create a Line X, and place a Blast 3 with at least three meters overlapping the Line’s area. X is equal to your Weapon’s Range. For one full round, if a foe moves in or out of that area, you may make a Ranged Weapon attack, Frequency allowing, against that foe as a Free Action. You may not attack a specific foe more than once per round this way. While this is in effect, if you Move from your current location, Overwatch’s effect is lost.
